name: EXSP-Tech
description:
A minutes-long horror game with seven endings that help tell different versions of a story

...Or just make it for one more weird day at work.

  •  Contains light cursing, somewhat obscure themes (non-explicit), eventual surprising sounds that can be muted (though, if you ask the manager, she will say it's the wind);
  • Playing with sound is recommended;
  • It should take roughly 15 minutes to reach all endings;
  • Rated 17+.
Finished playing it? Read the story!
